transcript.text: Third Day in South Corea!
[DAY TWO] (Well it's actually day 3 Lucas but it's ok)
(Enjoy!)
[안녕하세요/annyeonghaseyo]  (Hi in Corean)
I am as of right now in a restaurant, sitted cross-leg.
Fancy atmosphere!
So today,
we are going to the shooting range
I never shot in my life. I wanna know how it feels.
Cause in video game, we shoot all the time.
We actually spend thousands of hours shooting with virtual weapons.
I do not really like guns.
I am just curious about it.
Well, I'll maybe hate it and I am going to freak out.
I won't ever be willing to shoot, I don't know.
I hope you enjoyed the last video.
I did!
I liked it and I suscribed!
Ok, see you later...
in a shooting range!
(고맙습니다/gomabseubnida)
It does not mean "bon appetit";  it actually means "thank you",
but I do not know how to say "bon appetit".
The shooting range is just above a bank.
The bank is actually there! *chuckles*
If you wanna rob a bank, it's easy!
Ok guys, I have now to choose my gun.
I have six choices.
Including a glock and a USP.
As a Counter Strike player...
I have to tell that...!
Okay folks, I had to move to my phone for recording.
I do not have the right to use my camera here.
*BOOM* The shooting range is right here!
But I think I might be able to put my phone in that thing..
to film.
That's the good new!
It makes..*BOOM* a lot of noise. I don't like it at all!
*BOOM*
Woaah! That's impressing.
I am freaking out.
Ok, it's my turn.
*Super Mario Theme Remix*
*BOOM*

*Star Mario Theme* 
*BOOM*
*BOOM*
*BOOM*
*BOOM*
*GAME OVER MUSIC*
Okay guys, I just came out.
*BOOM*
OOOKAY...*chuckles*
Each time they open the door, the noise is crazy!!
So, listen..
I almost shit in my pants.
It's was terrifying, I felt so bad.
In general, I hate big noises.
And each time you shot, there is this HUGE noise.
So it freaks me out!
But I shot 10 bullets and I earned 91 points!
In general, I don't shoot in the middle but rather in the circle just next to it.
So there you go. I am as skilled in shooting as I am with darts.
Yes, I'm good with targets!
In fact, there is a huge recoil.
when you shoot. Well I had the glock so it's not a crazy recoil comparing to
a Colt or I don't know.
But you have a heat wave on the face.
It's crazy.
I won't do it anymore.
But I'll do this!
I'll do this forever!
I huge thank to the agency that allowed me to shoot today.
Agency responsible for my trauma.
We are going to meet a friend.
His name is Fabien, he has be living here for a while now.
And he is going to make us visit a university.
Ok I am with my pal. How are you Fabien?
Fabien : Yo!
Fabien is one of the only male in the university we are going to visit.
We are going to show you.
It is the biggest university in the whole world, am I right?
Fabien : Women university !
Lucas : WOMEN!
Those we prefer
Fabien : so yes I am in a women university.
Lucas: is it a cool thing?

Fabien: it is not so bad.
Lucas: no too bad!
Fabien : well kind of oppressing.
Lucas : the university is huge, they accepted him cause he is an international student.

You don't have Corean nationality.
Fabien : exactly.
Lucas : does it mean each time a girl sees a dude in the uni, it's a foreigner?
Fabien : yup. Or sometimes it's just a weird corean stalker here to..
*chuckles*

Lucas : take many pictures!
Fabien : well it happens a lot.
Lucas : SERIOUSLY?
Oh my god it's super creepy.
Wait, is it a university or a mall? There is a damn bakery!

Fabien: there is a Barnes and Noble..
Lucas : THERE IS A BARNES AND NOBLE??
The building was made so that when you make a VLOG, your voice echoes and people are judging you.
Fabien : Corean cuisine by Fabien Yoon!
Lucas: this was a short ad, thank you all!
So we are now in the building.
There are restaurants.
Fabien: there are plenty of students cause it's a exam period.
Lucas: shhhh!
Fun fact in 3...2...1...
You earn points when you go to church.
If we do that in France, there would be a civil war.
There is a gym in the university!!
You had a great time there?
Fabien: I felt like in that music video.. what was it?
Together: Call on meeee  ♪
Lucas: warning, amazing video!
♫ *Call on me - Eric Pryds* ♫
But your body is a coward body.
*POOOOOOOO*
*stupid chuckes*
Today is December 31st..
and people are studying behind me.
This place is huge, it's amazing.
That girl is not good at math.
It was a really bad pun.
There is a kindergarten as well.
There you go.
Or maybe they are genius with MANY YEARS of advance in the system.
Okay folks, we are now in a bowling..that is actually a nightclub.
*amazing club music*
And because there are no sport left, they put us in a room in which we can play..
Tennis table!
Fabien: OH! OH! OH!

Lucas: PAF! 
Fabien: b*stard!
Lucas: The b*stard's technique.

Lucas: OH!
Fabien: *sshole!
*chuckles*
And after this amazing match, we are on the bowling track!
*happy music*
And now..AAAAH!
Everything is going to depend on the last shot.
Fabien : OH !
Fabien : OH !
*sad music*
*despair music*
After I miserably lost, Fabien wanted to make me happy again..
We went to a Cat Coffee shop.
From a violent world,
to a world of love,
and peace.
And cats.
What is amazing about this place is that you can adopt cats.
So if you have a crush on one of them, you can take it home and adopt it for real!
Fabien: you have space left in your luggage?

Lucas: Nope. But I already have two home.
Fabien: oh yeah.
Lucas: it feels strange to see cats cause I miss Lua and Jumbo terribly when I am not home.
Look at this: they are everywhere!
*Kawaii Japanese music*
I am careful with my feets.
This one eats.
And there is even a place to sleep with them.
There is a floor,
just for them.
and there are plenty spots when cats come to you.
After this terrible bowling experience, nothing could have made me feel better.
He is feeling so good right here.

Wait! This cube is exactly his size. There aren't any inches left. *chuckles* 
Fabien : But cats like it.
Fabien: they like small spaces.
Hi there!
How are you doing?
He is grumpy; he does not like what I am doing at all.
We are going to let him be. Maybe he lost at the bowling as well.
FOOD.
Hey! One is hidden. *chuckles*
Try to find the cat. *chuckles*
"I am hidden!"
"I hate people."
*BIP*
*BIP*
*BIP*
*fireworks and happy screams*
I am already celebrating the new year's eve in my favorite district.
It's amazing!
We are like six billion and there is the firework.
*happy music*
*surprising music*
Ok guys, it's 6 am in Corea and I am in igloo mode cause it's super super super cold.
Negative temperature.
It's a taxi war.
It's because there is like one billion people looking for a cab and only 20 cabs.
We have been walking for an hour.
Fabien: but we have a Meowth.
Lucas: WE HAVE MEOWTH!
Fabien: and that is beautiful.
Lucas: We went to an arcade.
And we enjoyed it.
Ok, subway now. We are a bit diseapointed.
dying right now.
It's 8 am and I have to wake up in two hours,
to go to [corean city].
It's the second biggest city in Corea. It's going to be awesome. There is...
the SEA.
There is a huge market in which they sell plenty sea stuff.
Problem is I don't like sea stuff at all. But it's ok. I love fish.
Do you like Seafood?
Or are you more of a meat fan?
Erm..
SUSCRIBE!!
There you go.
Bye! *clic*
:D
:D
Ooh, the camera is adapting, shit!
